title: Swiggy launches 'Eatlists', a global-first feature in food delivery
description: The company said like creating and sharing music playlists, Swiggy's Eatlists feature will enable food enthusiasts to curate and share their favourite dishes directly within the Swiggy app.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
